Past members

Pyeon Yuil

Introduction

SORAN is a three-member South Korean indie band formed in 2009 and consisting of Ko Youngbae (founder of the band), Seo Myeonho, and Lee Taewook. They previously had a fourth member, Pyeon Yuil, but his departure from the band was announced on July 18, 2024.

The band debuted on August 19, 2010 with the release of their first EP "Why Didn't I Know It Then?".
